categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: A command shuttle was part of the complement of Lambda-class T-4a shuttles assigned to the Victory-class Star Destroyer Subjugator. It was readied on the order of Captain Kolaff to transport him to safety, but was commandeered by Walex Blissex and a team of Alliance to Restore the Republic agents to escape the starship.
